Returns: a AppNotIdleException suitable to be thrown on the instrumentation thread.
Parameters: List: list of idleConditions that failed to become idle.
int: number of times it was tried to check if they became idle.
int: number of seconds that was tried before giving up.
create(java.util.List<java.lang.String>,.Description: use @B_android#support#test#espresso#AppNotIdleException#create_E@ instead Creates a new AppNotIdleException suitable for erroring out a test case. This should be called only from the main thread if the app does not idle out within the specified duration.
create(java.util.List<java.lang.String>,.FullName: AppNotIdleException create (List<String> idleConditions, int loopCount, int seconds)

ClassDesc: An exception which indicates that the App has not become idle even after the specified duration.
